channel.title: Presentation on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in Presentation on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: DeepL Write
item.description: DeepL Write is an AI writing tool that can improve your written communication with just one click. It will help you with your writing by checking the grammar, punctuation, and style as well as providing suggestions and alternative phrasing.

item.title: Playground AI
item.description: Generate images for your presentations

item.title: Adobe Firefly
item.description: Experiment, imagine, and create an infinite range of images with Firefly, generative AI-powered content creation from Adobe.

item.title: Microsoft Bing Image Generator
item.description: Generate images by typing some texts.

item.title: Replicate
item.description: Run and share models in the cloud at scale.

item.title: Influence Map
item.description: Influence flower visualizes citation influences among academic entities, including papers, authors, institutions, and research topics.

item.title: Kroki
item.description: Creates diagrams from textual descriptions

item.title: Colorgorical
item.description: A categorical color generator for data visualizations. It takes into account of perceptual distance.

item.title: Coolors
item.description: Nice tool to select color palette/theme for figure plotting and/or design

item.title: slidev
item.description: Presentation Slides for Developers

item.title: Deckset
item.description: Deckset designs your slides, so you can focus on your ideas

item.title: Fusuma
item.description: A tool to create slides easily for you, using markdown with interactions (mdx).

item.title: Gitmind
item.description: Free, online mindmapping and flow charts

item.title: Table Convert Online
item.description: Web-based tool to converts Excel, URL, HTML, Markdown table and CSV to Markdown table, CSV/TSV, JSON, XML, YAML, insert SQL, HTML, Excel and LaTeX table.

item.title: Deepnote
item.description: Data science notebooks for teams

item.title: nomnoml
item.description: a tool for drawing UML diagrams based on a simple syntax.

item.title: Writing Science
item.description: As a scientist, you are a professional writer: your career is built on successful proposals and papers. Success isn’t defined by getting papers into print, but by getting them into the reader’s consciousness. Writing Science is built upon the idea that successful science writing tells a story. It uses that insight to discuss how to write more effectively.

item.title: Academic Phrasebank
item.description: The Academic Phrasebank is a general resource for academic writers. It aims to provide you with examples of some of the phraseological ‘nuts and bolts’ of writing organised according to the main sections of a research paper or dissertation.

item.title: Scrapbox
item.description: A knowledge base that lets you capture notes, code, and research lightning-fast. Everything adds to a web of ideas that’s easy to use at scale.

item.title: Tectonic Typesetting System
item.description: Tectonic is a modernized, complete, self-contained TeX/LaTeX engine, powered by XeTeX and TeXLive. Tectonic makes LaTeX easy to compile.

item.title: RemNote
item.description: The first spaced-repetition powered note-taking tool that lets you structure knowledge exactly in the way you think about it.

item.title: Mind the Graph
item.description: Create beautiful scientific infographics with no effort

item.title: Biorender
item.description: a powerful tool to draw scientific illustrations

item.title: Obsidian
item.description: note-taking with zettelkasten method (linked notes)

item.title: Notion
item.description: Write, plan, collaborate, and get organized — all in one tool. Write connected notes with rich format and Export to markdown, pdf, etc.

item.title: Whimsical
item.description: Visual workspace, online tool for quick diagrams

item.title: Detexify
item.description: Anyone who works with LaTeX knows how time-consuming it can be to find a symbol in symbols-a4.pdf that you just can’t memorize. Detexify is an attempt to simplify this search.

item.title: Undraw
item.description: Open source illustrations

item.title: Unsplash
item.description: Free high resolution images.

item.title: Speaker Deck
item.description: Share your slides with others and find interesting slides.

item.title: Gimp
item.description: Create and edit images

item.title: Inkscape
item.description: Create SVG graphs

item.title: Mathematica Slide Show
item.description: Mathematica can be used to create interative slides.

item.title: slides.com
item.description: Make dynamical slides with synchronous presentations over all devices.

item.title: Amphetamine App
item.description: Amphetamine keeps your Mac awake during presentations.

item.title: Mathematica Online
item.description: The online version of Mathematica!

item.title: Cocalc
item.description: A toolkit for coding and writing online. The UI is a bit outdated but the services are real hardcore.

item.title: Azure Notebooks
item.description: Azure notebooks is simply a hosted Jupyter notebook.

item.title: Google Colab
item.description: Google Colab is an online version of Jupyter Notebook which allows us to use free computation powers from Google and storage on Google Drive. Google Colab also comes with free GPU hours.
